body.name: Tampax Pearl Plastic Unscented Tampons, Ultra Absorbency, 18 Count
features: LeakGuard braid helps stop leaks before they happen
body.description: Product Description Tampax Pearl Plastic Tampons, Ultra Absorbency, Unscented, 18 Count From the Manufacturer Stay covered with our best-ever leak protection. view largerGet incredible protection with Tampax Pearl Tampons. The LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen to help you stay leak-free and worry-free for up to eight hours. The unique FormFit protection helps close the gaps that can cause leaks, while the CleanGuard layer adds an extra layer of protection around the tampon’s core.At a GlanceLeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happenFormFit design gently expands to your unique shapeKey Features view largerLeakGuard BraidHelps stop leaks before they happen view largerAnti-Slip GripMakes applicator easy to hold and position view largerSmooth, Rounded TipFor comfortable insertion view largerPurse-Resistant WrapperDiscreet wrapper that won’t fall apart in your purseAlso Try view largerTry Tampax Pearl Liners for an everyday clean, on or off your period, and try Tampax Compak Pearl for pocket-size protection.Stay covered with our best-ever leak protection. Same great protection available from Tampax RadiantPut it in place easily, thanks to the Anti-Slip GripHelp stop leaks before they happen with the Anti-Gravity LeakGuard BraidInsertion is a breeze with the smooth, rounded tipProduct Comparison Tampax Radiant Tampax Compak Pearl Tampax Pearl Original Tampax Tampax Pearl Active Tampax Radiant tampons, our ultimate protection experience, have a resealable wrapper for our most discreet disposal. For discreet and portable protection, try Tampax Radiant Compak tampons. Tampax Compak Pearl gives you a full-size tampon in a small, extendable plastic applicator. Tampax Pearl offers incredible protection with a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks. Tampax cardboard has an absorbent core designed to fit your unique shape. Tampax Pearl Active Plastic offer high-performance protection that help outlast the toughest workouts. FormFit gently expands to every shape, while an Antigravity Backup Braid helps stop leaks. Lite ✓ ✓ ✓ Regular ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Super ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Super Plus ✓ ✓ ✓ Ultra ✓ Frequently Asked QuestionsHow does Tampax Pearl stop leaks?Tampax Pearl has built-in backup protection. It has a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen and expands widthwise to fit your unique form.How does Tampax Pearl feel different than other tampons?Like you expect with the name Pearl, this tampon has a smooth, plastic applicator and rounded tip for comfortable insertion. Plus, it has a contoured Anti-Slip Grip to make the applicator easy to hold and position.If I like Tampax Pearl, what other products would be right for me?Try Tampax Pearl Liners for an everyday clean, on or off your period, and try Tampax Compak Pearl for pocket-size protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Pearl technology isn’t just a fancy name – it's a game-changer. Smooth insertion, reliable protection, and a sleek design make these tampons as precious as, well, pearls. You'll be feeling fabulous even on those not-so-fabulous days. With Tampax Pearl, you're not just surviving that time of the month – you're thriving. Whether it's a workout, a busy day at work, or a marathon, these tampons keep you comfortably active.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Choice But To Buy
reviews.reviewText: These are not available in the area I'm in. They only come in a multipack filled with tampons I don't need. You only get a handful of Ultras/Supers and like 100 regulars. I don't remember the actual amount but I don't like spending money on products I don't need and super/regulars I don't bother using and I have them coming out my ears. My flow has been extremely heavy recently and these are the only ones worth using. This is probably a review for tampax themselves; however all the pictures are right. My box came opened too. Customer service screwed up and took forever on my refund but they're the only ones who have these. I have no choice. Something really needs to be done about these opened boxes! Why open but not take any??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Wish I didn't need a tampon the size of a telephone pole and the absorbancy of a sham-wow but here I am.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bring Ultra absorbency back!!
reviews.reviewText: 2nd best Absorption unavailable.But was the best of Tampax...Playtex 360 Ultra was my number one but... They are also discontinued!!Feeling bitter.👿💔

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET AT TARGET
reviews.reviewText: These tampons are finally available for real heavy bleeders! Or perhaps I’m slow to catch on to finding out about them.Either way, these tampons saved my whole week in the woods camping. With super plus sized I still had to change it every hour or less during peak days. Ultra is good to go for about 1/4 day. Worth every penny to not have the constant worry of bleeding through tampon, pad, underwear and pants.HOWEVER, I RECOMMEND BUYING AT TARGET. Target has huge boxes of ultras at much better prices than anywhere on amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great absorption high price
reviews.reviewText: Revived in good condition. Good product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: They r the best I get really really heavy days an these save me at work I work in construction!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The box arrived open and beat up. I counted and they were all there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Although not cheap they are worth it. I bought these to take on holiday and no leaks at all on my heaviest days. Comfortable and easy to use. So much wish we could buy these ultra tampons in U.K. supermarkets. Big difference to super plus. Will definitely be buying more.
no hay otro tampones interno bueno como esto
DELIVERED THE WRONG PRODUCT - IMAGE ATTACHED OF WHAT WAS DELIVERED AGAINST ORDER

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: these are excellent for heavy periods!
reviews.reviewText: I got these as have irregular and very heavy periods. Id sometimes flood a super plus tampax and a pad within an hour or two when its bad. these offer a little more protection so have been a real find for me. I got 2 boxes and keep them in the back of the drawer for the really bad days or overnight. I initially wondered if these was quite big when i first got them, but if i use them only on the heavy flow days its great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These are great for very heavy periods but too expensive.
